title: Lux Film Days: check out this year's finalists in a cinema near you (European Parliament) ...
text: ( Source : European Parliament ) Coming soon to a screen near you: the three films short-listed for this year's Lux Prize will be shown in more than 40 cities all over Europe , subtitled in all of the EU's official 24 languages. During the Lux
